entry.string: Check this box if you do not want the output of this block to ever be cached.
entry.translation: Check thees bux iff yuoo du nut vunt zee ooootpoot ooff thees bluck tu ifer be-a ceched. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Check this box if the content of this block is NOT generated dynamically based on the URI query string.
entry.translation: Check thees bux iff zee cuntent ooff thees bluck is NOT genereted dynemeecelly besed oon zee URI qooery streeng.

entry.string: If the output cache of this block can be shared between users, select an appropriate level.
entry.translation: Iff zee ooootpoot ceche-a ooff thees bluck cun be-a shered betveee users, select un epprupreeete-a lefel.

entry.string: The maximum lifetime of the output cache of this block. Set to zero for no time based expiration.
entry.translation: Zee mexeemoom leeffetime-a ooff zee ooootpoot ceche-a ooff thees bluck. Set tu zeru fur nu teeme-a besed ixpureshun.
